trait.name: Reactive Heads
text: The three-headed cobra gets two extra reactions that can be used only for opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Three-headed
text: The cobra has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.

trait.name: Wakeful
text: While the three-headed cobra sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The three-headed cobra makes three bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
